column5: heading up this weekend, and curious at the conditions.  Ill assume there is lots, but wanted to be sure!  thx in advance,  yv
I have a friend down that way I have been trying to talk into joining this site ut it hasn't happened yet. I'll ask later this week and see if I can find out.
I'll assume THICK.   I'm in Elliot Lake (1 hour west) and our ice is 2 feet thick.  No snow to insulate has made for perfect ice making conditions!  The trails.....that's a whole different story!
ya, haha thats very true...... very different story for the trails.
thanks everyone...dana, keep me posted if you can...  cheers,  yv
